ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: If you had urges to pick during the past WEEK, on average, how strong were your urges?
During the past WEEK, on average, how many times did you experience urges to pick each day?
During the past WEEK, on average, how many occasions of picking were there each day?
During the past WEEK, on average, when you started picking skin, how long was each occasion?
During the past WEEK, on average, how much total time did you spend skin picking or on skin picking related activities each day?
During the past WEEK, on how many days did you engage in skin picking or skin picking-related activities?
During the past WEEK, how much emotional distress (mental pain or anguish, shame, guilt, embarrassment) has your skin picking caused you?
During the past WEEK, how much personal trouble (relationship, medical, or health has your skin picking caused you?
If you had urges to perform OCD-related rituals during the past WEEK, on average, how strong were your urges?
During the past WEEK, on average, how many times did you experience urges to perform these OCD-rituals each day?
During the past WEEK, on average, how much total time did you spend performing OCD-related rituals each day?
During the past WEEK, on average, how long did it last when you started to perform OCD-related rituals?
During the past WEEK, on how many days did you perform OCD-related rituals?
During the past WEEK, how much emotional distress (e.g., mental pain or anguish, shame, guilt, embarrassment) has your OCD-related rituals caused you?
During the past WEEK, how much personal trouble (relationship, medical, or health has your OCD-related rituals caused you?
If you had urges to pull during the past WEEK, on average, how strong were your urges?
During the past WEEK, on average, how many times did you experience urges to pull each day?
During the past WEEK, on average, how much total time did you spend hair pulling or on hair pulling-related activities each day?
During the past WEEK, on average, how many hairs did you pull each day?
During the past WEEK, on how many days did you engage in hair pulling or hair pulling-related activities?
During the past WEEK, how much emotional distress (mental pain or anguish, shame, guilt, embarrassment) has your hair pulling caused you?
During the past WEEK, how much personal trouble (relationship, medical, or health has your Hair pulling caused you?
